title: Mizuno Victory 3.5" Inseam Volleyball Short
description: Flexible fit designed to minimize bunching during play
Athlete specific pattern: allows for ease of movement
Flatlock gusset: Increases comfort during play.

The Victory Short is Mizuno's BEST. VOLLEYBALL. SHORT. EVER. Made with our top-of-the-line fabric, this is the softest, supportive, and most lightweight spandex we've ever made - all at the same time. This design features a 3.5-inch inseam and a wide waistband.
